head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KANTROWITZ, SIDNEY J. DDS,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KANTROWITZ, SIDNEY J. DDS,

block.p: KANTROWITZ-Sidney J. DDS, 88. Of Yorktown Heights. Formerly of Croton-on-Hudson. Died on July 8, 2000. Dentist and poet. Beloved husband for 57 years of the late Viola. Brother of Ira Kantrowitz. Father of Lucy Frank and the late Paul Kantrowitz. Grandfather of Michael Frank and devoted friend to Rose Greenfield. Memorial service to be announced.
